data.fullContent: Our medical offices will be closed next week, as we are remodeling our facilities. We expect to be finished in time for our annual health fair, although the reopening could be delayed due to unforeseen circumstances. Please contact our helpdesk if you have an emergency, and don't hesitate to reach out to our representatives at the hospital. Thank you for your understanding, and we look forward to addressing your needs in the future.
data.answer: 我们的医务室下周将关闭，因为我们正在重新装修我们的设施。我们希望能在年度健康博览会前完工，尽管由于不可预见的情况，重新开放可能会推迟。如果你有紧急情况，请联系我们的服务台，不要犹豫联系我们在医院的代表。感谢您的理解，我们期待着在未来满足您的需求。
